item.title: ID-75 North - Custer County
item.description: ID-75 north, just north of Clayton. The Salmon River is in the background.

item.title: ID-75 North - Entering Clayton
item.description: Entering Clayton on ID-75 North. Clayton has a population of 7, making it the second smallest city in the state behind Warm River.
